prefix.name: document.language.help
prefix.value: Correctly chosen document language will improve searching for it.

prefix.name: title.help
prefix.value: Document title will appear as it's name in site's navigational components.

prefix.name: keywords.help
prefix.value: Keywords allow focused searching for a document.

prefix.name: keywords.hint
prefix.value: Input keywords related to document's content.

prefix.name: tel.alert
prefix.value: Phone number must be at least 7 digits long, can start with + (plus) character, can contain spaces and - (dash). Multiple numbers can be seperated with ; (semicolon). After number, you can put short description, like: +48 00-00-000 ext. 10 ; 3456678 ask for Mr. Smith

prefix.name: e-mail.alert
prefix.value: E-mail must be formed as following: account@domain.tld

prefix.name: e-mails.alert
prefix.value: E-mail must be formed as following: account@domain.tld, multiple e-mails must be seperated with ; (semicolon)

prefix.name: add.author.help
prefix.value: In these fields You may input document's authors names.

prefix.name: document.content.help
prefix.value: In this field You may input document's content. If You're using MS Internet Explorer version 5.5 or higher, You may use rich text formatting tools. If You're using other browser, You have to use HTML tags to format the text.

prefix.name: document.content.alert
prefix.value: Entered content is not valid HTML code
